channel.title: KOW Pu Zhao (邱普照)
channel.description: PhD Student, Department of Mathematics, National Taiwan University (Office: ASMAB 556)

item.title: Publications and Preprints
item.description:
(2020) (with Jenn-Nan Wang) Reconstruction of an impenetrable obstacle in anisotropic inhomogeneous background, preprint.

(2020) (with Fioralba Cakoni and Jenn-Nan Wang) The interior transmission eigenvalue problem for elastic waves in media with obstacles, preprint.

(2020) (with Jenn-Nan Wang), Strict monotonicity of eigenvalues and unique continuation for spectral fractional elliptic operators. Unpublished manuscript.

(2019) (with Masato Kimura), The Lewy-Stampacchia Inequality for Fractional Laplacian and Its Application to Anomalous Unidirectional Diffusion Equations, arXiv:1909.00588

(2019) On Landis Conjecture for the Fractional Schrödinger Equation, arXiv:1905.01885

(2019) (with Ching-Lung Lin), On decay rate of solutions for the stationary Navier-Stokes equation in an exterior domain, J. Differential Equations, 266, 3279-3309

item.title: International Conferences & Summer Schools Experiences
item.description:
International Conferences Attendance:

  • (2020) Student Organizer, East Asian Core Doctoral Forum on Mathematics 2020, Kavli IPMU, Tokyo (2020.1.14 ~ 2020.1.17)
  • (2019) The 5th East Asia Section of IPIA Young Scholars Symposium, Academy of Mathematics and Systems Science, Chinese Academy of Sciences, Beijing (2019.6.7 ~ 2019.6.8)
  • (2018) East Asian Core Doctoral Forum on Mathematics 2018, Tsinghua University, Beijing (2018.1.12 ~ 2018.1.16)

Summer Schools:

  • (2019) Internship Program for Science & Engineering Students, Kanazawa University, Kanazawa (2019.8.5 ~ 2019.9.6)
  • (2019) European Embedded Control Institute, International Graduate School on Control, Sichuan University, Chengdu (2019.7.7 ~ 2019.7.27)
  • (2018) 2018 Tutorial on Calderon’s Problem, Visibility and Invisibility, National University of Singapore (2018.8.6 ~ 2018.8.17)

item.title: Academic Awards
item.description: (2017) Outstanding Master Thesis Silver Award, Taiwan Mathematical Society
